paramInformation.label: Overload Protection
paramInformation.description: Turn off if the load power exceeds 0.5A for more than 5s.

paramInformation.label: Load Status Change Notification
paramInformation.description: Send notification to associated devices when load is changed.

options.label: Only when load is not changed

paramInformation.label: Indicator Modes
paramInformation.description: The RGB LED indicator will indicate the load.

options.label: Indicate for 5 seconds after load has changed

paramInformation.label: Power Report Threshold
paramInformation.description: Power threshold for when to send reports to associated devices

paramInformation.label: Power Report Percentage Threshold
paramInformation.description: Percentage threshold for when to send report to associated devices

paramInformation.label: Power Report Frequence
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending power report to association device.

paramInformation.label: Energy Report Frequence
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending energy report to association device.

paramInformation.label: Voltage Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending voltage report to association device.

paramInformation.label: Electricity Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending electricity report to association device.
